member.name: T:Pixy2
member.summary: Before use this module, Please import first: import "Mods\Pixy2" The Pixy2 module made by OFDL Taiwan. *Please set Pixy2 Interface to "LEGO I2C" mode.

member.name: M:getLargest
member.summary: Gets Largest object info from Pixy2.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getSignature
member.summary: Gets specific object info from Pixy2 by signature.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.
The signature you want to set.

member.name: M:setLampOn
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:setLampOff
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.
